AAY.caption: Text to copy
AAY.doc: Specify the text to copy here. It can be a dynamic text.
AAY.name: source

AAZ.caption: Use ID attribute of element
AAZ.doc: If yes the copy/cut action will use an id instead of a dynamic text field. If checked this will override the Input text field
AAZ.name: use_id

AAa.caption: Target element ID attribute
AAa.doc: Attribute Id of element to perform the action on
AAa.name: target_id

AAb.caption: Action type
AAb.doc: Clipboard action to perform. Either copy or cut. Note that you cannot cut text from a static field like a text element. You can only cut from input text fields
AAb.name: action_type
